channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- All Qualcomm products
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- All Qualcomm products

item.title: CVE-2015-9038|2024-09-17T01:20:48.398Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a NULL pointer may be dereferenced in the front end.

item.title: CVE-2014-9968|2024-09-17T01:40:46.783Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the UIMDIAG interface.

item.title: CVE-2016-5858|2024-09-17T01:01:48.857Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In an ioctl handler in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, if a user supplies a value too large, then an out-of-bounds read occurs.

item.title: CVE-2017-8254|2024-09-17T01:36:29.403Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, an audio client pointer is dereferenced before being checked if it is valid.

item.title: CVE-2017-9685|2024-09-17T01:46:46.158Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a race condition in a WLAN driver can lead to a Use After Free condition.

item.title: CVE-2016-5861|2024-09-17T02:52:01.817Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In a display driver in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, a variable controlled by userspace is used to calculate offsets and sizes for copy operations, which could result in heap overflow.

item.title: CVE-2016-5347|2024-09-17T00:46:31.766Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, kernel stack data can be leaked to userspace by an audio driver.

item.title: CVE-2017-8273|2024-09-17T02:11:51.405Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android release from CAF using the Linux kernel, while processing fastboot boot command when verified boot feature is disabled, with length greater than boot image buffer, a buffer overflow can occur.

item.title: CVE-2017-8255|2024-09-17T02:57:46.420Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, an integer overflow vulnerability exists in boot.

item.title: CVE-2016-5864|2024-09-17T01:16:55.066Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In an audio driver function in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, some parameters are from userspace, and if they are set to a large value, integer overflow is possible followed by buffer overflow. In another function, a missing check for a lower bound may result in an out of bounds memory access.

item.title: CVE-2016-5859|2024-09-17T01:40:50.943Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In a sound driver in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, if a function is called with a very large length, an integer overflow could occur followed by a buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2015-9053|2024-09-17T02:01:15.340Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the processing of certain responses from the USIM.

item.title: CVE-2015-9067|2024-09-17T01:26:32.296Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a potential compiler optimization of memset() is addressed.

item.title: CVE-2015-9039|2024-09-17T00:46:38.979Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a vulnerability exists in eMBMS where an assertion can be reached by a sequence of downlink messages.

item.title: CVE-2017-6421|2024-09-17T01:01:00.314Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In the touch controller function in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, a variable may be controlled by the user and can lead to a buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2015-9041|2024-09-17T00:47:01.161Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a buffer overflow vulnerability exists when performing WCDMA radio tuning.

item.title: CVE-2014-9975|2024-09-17T00:56:37.240Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a rollback vulnerability potentially exists in Full Disk Encryption.

item.title: CVE-2017-8256|2024-09-17T01:47:03.639Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, array out of bounds access can occur if userspace sends more than 16 multicast addresses.

item.title: CVE-2014-9973|2024-09-17T02:36:47.826Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, validation of a buffer length was missing in a PlayReady DRM routine.

item.title: CVE-2015-9043|2024-09-17T00:05:42.151Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a NULL pointer can be dereferenced upon the expiry of a timer.

item.title: CVE-2015-8596|2024-09-17T01:35:45.573Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, validation of buffer lengths is missing in malware protection.

item.title: CVE-2016-5854|2024-09-17T01:16:20.139Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In a driver in all Qualcomm products with Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, or QRD Android, kernel heap memory can be exposed to userspace.

item.title: CVE-2017-9680|2024-09-17T02:06:56.838Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, if a pointer argument coming from userspace is invalid, a driver may use an uninitialized structure to log an error message.

item.title: CVE-2017-8270|2024-09-17T00:15:40.421Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a race condition exists in a driver potentially leading to a use-after-free condition.
